thread.section_title: Sheraton Kampala Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent trip.
thread.title_full: Excellent trip. - Review of Sheraton Kampala Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: santajoycel
title: Excellent trip.
text:
Very neat.
Staff are warm, position of the hotel is very good, in the center of the city, near all required facilities.
Environment safe, natural, plenty of birds, near state house, both public and private transport is within reach. Recreation facilities are within the hotel area. The meals are in time and have variety for good selections. Conference halls are good, airy, furnitures are comfortable, public address systems are clear. Accommodation are comfortable, good bed dings and are very clean. Wash rooms both public and rooms are well maintained. Lounge are well set up with very good furnitures, comfortable.
